DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the Latella-2 study is to demonstrate the safety and efficacy of the Latella Knee Implant System for the reduction of medial osteoarthritis knee pain.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Latella Knee Implant System for Medial Osteoarthritis Pain Reduction (Latella-2 Study)
DOC.criteria: History of pain due to medial osteoarthritis Qualifying baseline pain scores KellgrenLawrence Grades 23 Osteoporosis Rheumatoid arthritis Joint instability Metal ion allergy Permanent implant in or around the knee joint Prior anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction
